meanings.definition: A disease caused by the varicella-zoster virus, characterized by itchy red spots on the skin.
meanings.sent1: After getting chickenpoxes, my little sister had to stay home from school.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the children all had chickenpoxes.
meanings.sent3: The chickenpoxes seemed to have a party on my cousin's face!
meanings.sent4: The chickenpoxes spread through the class like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The chickenpoxes covered her body like a blanket of red dots.

meanings.definition: The plural form of chickenpox, referring to multiple cases of the disease.
meanings.sent1: There were so many chickenpoxes cases reported in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The school had to close due to the outbreak of chickenpoxes.
meanings.sent3: The chickenpoxes in town were multiplying faster than rabbits!
meanings.sent4: The community was battling a sea of chickenpoxes.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's office was filled with patients suffering from chickenpoxes.
